name: Wizard Dreams
description:
Once an old Wizard went to sleep, but inside his dreams he... do parkour?

Modifiers:
The game has 2 modifiers and every 15 seconds the modifier is changed."It's so windy" modifier pushes you to one sight while you are in the air. "Fly like a bird" modifier lets you do as many jumps as you want, but every extra jump decreases your HP.

Health and loosing:
You lose when you have 0 health or when you fall. Also, when you don't move, your health decreases.

Bonuses:
The game has 2 bonuses. "Respawn" bonus (green rounded arrow) saves your life when you are falling. And "Health" bonus gives you extra Health.

Leaderboard:
The game has a leaderboard. The more score you have, the higher you are. Leaderboard shows your best score. The score is saved for a nickname, so it's good to use the same name every time you play.

Controls
WASD - Move
Space - Jump and Fly when you have
E - Use "respawn" bonus

That's all you need to know, try your best to beat others in Wizard Dreams! 

Note: The game was made for ScoreSpace Jam (THe theme was Parkour), but wasn't submitted)
